title: Mohammad Dastgheib
text:
I am a PhD student in Psychology and Cognitive Neuroscience at UC Riverside, specializing in perceptual processing and human-computer interaction. My research focuses on designing psychophysical experiments using eye tracking and pupillometry.






Note



Available for Summer 2025 Internship (June 9 - August 30, 2025)

title: Mohammad Dastgheib
text:
I am a PhD student in Psychology and Cognitive Neuroscience at UC Riverside, specializing in perceptual processing and human-computer interaction. My research focuses on designing psychophysical experiments using eye tracking and pupillometry.






Note



Available for Summer 2025 Internship (June 9 - August 30, 2025)

title: Research
text:
My research in the Seitz Lab focuses on:

Investigating visual perception using pupillometry
Developing experimental paradigms with PsychToolbox
Applying signal detection theory and computational modeling
Coordinating research projects and supervising assistants
